name: creed
description: Sophisticated and functionally-minded async with advanced features: coroutines, promises, ES2015 iterables, fantasy-land
author: brian@hovercraftstudios.com

scripts.build-dist: npm run build-lib && esperanto -b -t umd -o dist/creed.js -i build/main.js -s -n creed && uglifyjs -c 'warnings=false' -m -o dist/creed.min.js -- dist/creed.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-dist && npm run test-main && npm run test-aplus
